paper.title: A map editing kernel implementation: application to multiple scale display
paper.abstract: User interfaces are a fundamental component of applications using as a support. Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and geographic DataBase Management Systems (DBMS). We propose in this paper a model and an architecture for designing Geographic Database User Interfaces (GDUI). A GDUI kernel based on this architecture has been implemented using, at the interface programming level, X Windows, Motif and C++, and, at the database level, the GeO2 data model [DRS93b] implemented itself on top of the O2 DBMS. From the starting model, we make a first proposal for multiple scale map display.
